SELECT t.`id` id, t.`org_target_id` orgTargetId, t.`org_terrace_id` orgTerraceId, t.`cust_no` custNo, t.`cust_name` custName, t.`cert_no` certNo, t.`target_state` targetState, t.`tender_time` tenderTime, t.`full_scale_time` fullScaleTime, t.`t_re_captical` tReCaptical, t.`t_re_interest` tReInterest, t.`l_re_time` lRepaymentTime, t.`a_square_time` aSquareTime, t.`a_re_captical` aReCaptical, t.`a_re_interest` aReInterest, t.`today_re_captical` todayReCaptical, t.`today_re_interest` todayReInterest, t.`e_re_captical` eReCaptical, t.`e_re_interest` eReInterest, t.`paid_sum` paidSum, t.`debt_sum` creditSum, t.`credit_sum` debtSum, t.`t_credit_sum` tCreditSum FROM t_gq_fss_sftp_finance_sum t
